name: T - Emily
_source: speak;Emma; Hey, sis!{w} How're you holding up?
speak;Emily; I'm barely keeping myself up{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Mom didn't tell me how rough seasickness actually is{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I think I'll be alright, though.
speak;Emma; It probably slipper her mind that we've never been at sea before.{w} It's so vast and bright, I'm just{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Emily, are you sure you're alright? You're pale as a sheet.
speak;Emily; I ate some nasty root thing that's supposed to make me feel better,{w} but{tgm}...{tgm}it's not working very well{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Aw, why not ask Mom to lay down somewhere below deck?{w} Maybe they have a hammock down there.
speak;Emma; I think I'll{tgm}...{tgm}leave her to deal with that on her own{tgm}...
